chapter.title: Navigate within videos
chapter.para: This window will let you navigate within all videos stored within Webcampak as far as you have been granted access to the requested source.

section.title: Global view
section.para: When you first load the page you will be automatically redirected to the latest video created by the source with the lower weight.

section.title: Source selection
section.para: On the top left of the window a drop down list will let you select a different source. This list will only include sources for which you have been granted access.
If a source is missing please get in touch with your Webcampak administrator and ask him to check your permissions.

section.title: In-browser video preview
section.para: In the list, on the left part of the window, click on a video you would like to watch.
You will then see a preview picture on the right part of the window, click on this picture to start your video.

section.title: Downloading a video
section.para: To download a video, simply right-click on the green arrow in the list and select "Save link as" or any similar option depending of your web browser.
Please note that only the H.264 (highest quality) video will be offered for download. If you want to download the MP4 video, please connect to your source using a FTP client.
